item.title: Setting up NeoVim for Godot
item.description: Recently I’ve been using Godot a bit to mess around with game development and I wanted to have autocompletion working with CoC. I looked around and there were no extensions for the Godot LSP. So, to use Godot with NeoVim I just had to connect to their LSP.
